entry.title: what is a bug hunter
entry.content:
a bunch of security reaserches that test websites looking for errors and bugs that can be dangerous for users ; and for protecting users the conpany offer bounties

bug hunting sites

hackerone
bugcrowd
intigriti
disclose.io

Methodologies

XSS

Does the page functionality display something to the users?
Input Vectors:

  • Customizable Themes & Profiles via CSS
  • Event or meeting names
  • URI based
  • Imported from a 3rd party (think Facebook integration)
  • JSON POST Values (check returning content type)
  • File Upload names
  • Uploaded files (swf, HTML, ++)
  • Custom Error pages
  • fake params - ?realparam=1&foo=bar‚Äô+alert(/XSS/)+‚Äô
  • Login and Forgot password forms

SQLI

Does the page look like it might need to call on stored data?
discovery payloads : SLEEP(1) /‚Äò or SLEEP(1) or ‚Äò‚Äú or SLEEP(1) or ‚Äú/
cheat sheet

App functionality

User priv

‚Ä¢ Add user function
‚Ä¢ Delete user function
‚Ä¢ start project / campaign / etc function
‚Ä¢ change account info (pass, CC, etc) function
‚Ä¢ customer analytics view
‚Ä¢ payment processing view
‚Ä¢ any view with PIIInsecure direct object references
IDORs are common place in bounties, and hard to catch with scanners ;use manual testing and burp.

and more ..., if have any questions about this field or u want to dig any welcome to my discord sever NetworkSquad

entry.title: what is mathematics
entry.content:
• The science of numbers and shapes

  • My idea of mathematics is exploring and the process of understanding patterns in the universe

  • Life is full of patterns

  • Math is a tool discoverd by humans

Human Intelligence aims to adapt to new environments by utilizing a combination of different cognitive processes

  • Mathematics is the language in which we express rigorous ideas and study the logical consequences of these ideas.

  • Physicists want answers, and the way they get answers is by doing computations

  • Using AI is more efficient to solve problems using math due to time and complexitie

    Artificial Intelligence aims to build machines that can mimic human behavior and perform human-like actions

  • Deep math trench
    Image

  • If you find a simple solution to something, that might not be the best solution.

  • Evolution is not necessarily an optimizer. It‚Äôs a tinkerer. How much of it is due to just accidents

  • Video -Corina tarnita

  • Evolutionary Dynamics: Exploring the Equations of Life ~Martin A Nowak
